title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practice Competencies: Newton’s Laws of Motion—Scientific Inquiry via Peer Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics concepts (force, acceleration, mass) and ability to perform simple mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply Newton’s three laws of motion to explain and predict real-world problems (e.g., mechanical design, safety management)
Learners identify conceptual errors through peer discussions and provide feedback during scientific argumentation processes
Learners self-assess learning outcomes by analyzing real-time data collected via digital devices (clicker systems)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
